description: 1 x London Plane (T14): Crown lift to give 5m clearance from ground level above road, by shortening pendulous secondary branches.1 x Whitebeam (T15): Crown lift to give 5m clearance from ground level above road, by shortening branches.1 x Poplar (T16): Crown lift to 5m clearance from ground level, by removing epicormic branches.1 x Maidenhair tree (T17): Crown lift to give 5m clearance from ground level above road, by shortening branches.3 x Cherry (T18 to T20): Crown lift to give 5m clearance from ground level above road, by shortening branches and removing epicormics.1 x Walnut (T21): Crown lift to give 5m clearance from ground level above road, pruning 1 x lowest branch S side (that is about 50mm in diameter) in line with kerbedge, and by pruning drooping branches back to previous most recent reduction points.1 x London plane (T22): Reduce lateral growth on S aspect by about 2.5m to c. 8m from the trunk to suitable growth points to maintain natural canopy shape. Crown lift to give 5m clearance from ground level above road, by shortening pendulous secondary branches, and by pruning back to previous most recent reduction points.1 x Hawthorn (T23): Crown lift to give 5m clearance from ground level above road, by removing epicormic growth and by pruning drooping branches back to previous most recent reduction points.1 x Hornbeam (T24): Crown lift to give 5m clearance from ground level above road, by tip pruning the end of branches.1 x Norway maple (T25): Crown lift to give 5m clearance from ground level above road, by shortening lowest lateral branches. 1 x Lime (T26): 1 x lime (26): Reduce by about 2.5m to previous, most recent reduction points, retaining shortened furnishing growth and at least 50% of fine branch structure. Crown lift to 5m clearance from ground level, by removing epicormic branches from the trunk.1 x lime (T27): fell. 1 x Walnut(T28): Crown lift to give 5m clearance from ground level above road, by shortening branches.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: work in accordance with British Standard
